rooms.description: Open and welcoming entrance space with natural light and ventilation.
Spacious living area integrated with the central courtyard, featuring Mediterranean-style decor and comfortable seating arrangements.
Adjacent to the kitchen, this dining area is designed for family meals with a view of the courtyard.
Well-equipped kitchen with modern amenities while maintaining Mediterranean charm.
Open central space featuring greenery and water elements for relaxation, promoting a connection with nature as per Vastu principles.
A comfortable guest suite with en-suite bathroom to accommodate extended family members or visitors.
Well-planned bathroom adjacent to the guest room, ensuring privacy and comfort.
Dedicated gym area with modern equipment and soundproofing for a private workout space.
Functional storage area designed to accommodate family needs, including closets and utility spaces.

openings.description: Main entrance door featuring wide glass panels for natural light, placed in the north-east direction as per Vastu guidelines.
Balconies designed for each bedroom on upper levels to ensure privacy and connectivity with the garden.
Strategically placed windows that allow optimal light and ventilation, ensuring energy efficiency in line with sustainable practices.
